Frequently Asked Questions

General Questions

What is OPSource?

OPSource is a comprehensive trading platform that combines AI/ML capabilities with high-performance trading engines.

What components are included?

  • Anya AI/ML Trading Engine

  • Dash33 High-Performance Trading Engine

  • Enterprise Integration Tools

  • Mobile Trading Platform

Technical Questions

System Requirements

  • Python 3.8+

  • Rust 1.70+

  • 8GB RAM minimum

  • SSD storage recommended

Supported Platforms

  • Linux (Ubuntu 20.04+)

  • Windows 10/11

  • macOS 12+

Integration Questions

How do I integrate with existing systems?

See Enterprise Integration for detailed integration guides.

What APIs are available?

  • REST API

  • WebSocket API

  • FIX Protocol

  • Custom Integration Options

Security Questions

How secure is OPSource?

We implement industry-standard security measures: - Multi-factor authentication - End-to-end encryption - Regular security audits - Compliance with financial regulations

What compliance standards are supported?

  • SOC 2

  • ISO 27001

  • GDPR

  • CCPA

Trading Questions

What order types are supported?

  • Market Orders

  • Limit Orders

  • Stop Orders

  • Advanced Algorithmic Orders

What markets can I trade?

  • Cryptocurrencies

  • Stocks

  • Futures

  • Options

  • Forex

Support Questions

How do I get help?

  1. Check documentation

  2. Join Discord community

  3. Contact support team

  4. Submit GitHub issue

What support plans are available?

  • Community Support (Free)

  • Standard Support

  • Enterprise Support

  • Custom Support Plans
